title: Taking action
creator_credit: James Mann and TV Ed Productions
brief_description: This video has been prepared to assist and challenge people in positions of responsibility in schools to provide active and supportive leadership to staff by identifying issues of concern; creating openings for discussion; and taking action in creative, caring and supportive ways. Presents three case studies showing typical school situations in which work performance and organisational issues affect staff relations.
